entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who howled and her nose was dribbling down her front. She made no effort to stem the flow.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby has traveled the country for two whole years trying to find work. He wants paying now.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione said 'Good for you, Dobby!' and supported him.

relationships.description: Dobby and Winky both seem to have similar experiences as house-elves who are trying to find work.
Hermione supports Dobby's decision to want paying for his work.
